title: Learning Analytics-Based Course Design Support Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Experience in operating blended learning environments for language proficiency improvement in corporate settings. Capable of collecting learning data using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can optimize the online-offline activity ratio in blended learning courses using learning analytics data.
Learners can improve learning engagement by 20% through checkpoint analysis, including student login frequency and content interaction patterns.
Based on weekly learning process visualizations, learners can shorten the teacher-student feedback cycle to within one week.

resources: Learning Management System (LMS) and Analytics Tools

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
